section.title: Document Information
section.para: This document provides information on the new user experience that offers to corporate users in 6.0 version. The new dashboard is built using Angular. consists of a set of modules (or functions) giving the corporate user online access to various services offered by the bank. Each module provides options to initiate transactions and follow through their life cycle. There are additional functions that provide enquiry, reporting and calendar management facilities.
The document also provides information on steps you need to perform to enable Modern Dashboard.

note.para: The availability of the menus and functions described in this document is dependent on the permissions assigned. Only those functions that you are authorized to use are available.
